ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Two: Fierce Fauna
ComicInfo.Summary:
Superstar JEFF PARKER (Future Quest) returns to FLASH GORDON, alongside the astounding team of JESSE HAMM & GRACE ALLISON! The Phantoms, Mandrake The Magician and Flash are on the run from forces they donâ€™t understand! Do our on-the-run titans stand a chance against spiders made of apes!?!?
